title: CCTS
description: Dar Al-Hekma University is honored to host the 2nd International Conference on Creativity, Technology, and Sustainability on April 30 – May 1, 2025, in partnership with the Ministry of Communications and Information Technology and the Ministry of Environment, Water and Agriculture. The event will feature keynote sessions, Springer-published research papers, scientific posters, workshops, startup stories, and the Smart Legal Advisor Challenge. It will conclude with an award ceremony and guided tours of the DAHU CODE Lab.

title: IEEE Workshop
description: Join our customized IEEE Xplore training session and learn how to search like a pro! Discover the most-cited and most-downloaded papers in your field, stay updated with top research from global experts, set personalized alerts, and use time-saving tools to save and share your findings. Perfect for both new and experienced users.

title: Explore the World & Make a Difference
description: هل فكرت يومًا في دمج السفر مع التطوع؟ انضم إلى لقائنا التعريفي مع فريق ڤولار وتعرّف على كيف نحول التطوع والسفر إلى تجارب تُغيّر الحياة حول العال

title: Sustainability Club
description: Celebrate Earth Day with Us!  From the Sustainability Club — Happy Earth Day!Today, we celebrate our beautiful planet and renew our commitment to protecting it.

title: Creative Explosion Workshop: “Build Your Own LEGO Robot
description: Creative Explosion Workshop: 'Build Your Own LEGO Robot… and Bring It to Life!' Imagine this: You grab a handful of LEGO bricks You build, connect, program… and suddenly — your robot comes to life and follows your commands!
